welcome_message_body: Welcome to Zhongli, Taiwan! Known for its bustling night markets and beautiful parks, this vibrant city is ready to charm you. We invite you to explore and experience all that Zhongli has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

airports.airport_name: Taiwan Taoyuan International (Chiang Kai Shek International)

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport, serving a wide range of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal at Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport, primarily serving China Airlines and other SkyTeam alliance airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but users must register with a valid email address to access the network.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
